vlive.korean: 오~ 그러면 감방에서... Oh... Then in jail... 듣기 View video Apink : 야식먹방!!!
니 감방 안에 있다. It's in your jail cell. 듣기 View video 홍익슈퍼 (HONG IK SUPER) : [홍익슈퍼]EP14_ 연희야, 내가 구해줄게
어둡고 습한 감방에서 콩밥을 먹든가. Or do you want to have prison food somewhere dark and humid? 듣기 View video 아이엠 (I am) : <사랑, 기억에 머물다> 3-2화 [시작]
vlive.english: Or do you want to have prison food somewhere dark and humid?

vlive.korean: [아직 드라마 촬영이 끝나지 않은 승유니] 승윤이는 아직 감방에 더 있어야 돼요. [Yoon has not finished shooting drama] Yoon still needs to be in jail. 듣기 View video WINNER : [자막용] 퇴근길~^_^
vlive.english: [Yoon has not finished shooting drama] Yoon still needs to be in jail.

examples.korean: an anguished letter from her prison cell 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 교도소 감방에서 괴로움에 겨워 쓴 편지 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: prisoners thrown in jail and left to rot 듣기 Add to Wordbook 감방에 처넣어진 채 썩어 가도록 방치되는 죄수들 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: He was stripped naked and left in a cell. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 옷을 발가벗기운 채 감방에 남겨졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was stripped naked and left in a cell. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: At 9 p.m. the prisoners are locked in for the night. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 재소자들은 오후 9시가 되면 밤 시간을 보내도록 감방에 갇힌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: At 9 p.m. the prisoners are locked in for the night. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Over twenty prisoners were crushed into a small dark cell. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 스무 명이 넘는 죄수들이 작고 어두운 감방 안에 쑤셔 넣어져 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Over twenty prisoners were crushed into a small dark cell. Add to Wordbook
